Detailed Description

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the checked state of a compound button changed.

We can use CompoundButton::setOnCheckedChangeListener to register this callback.

The following example demonstrates how to use the ICompoundBtnCheckedChangeListener

 CompoundButtonTest.h
 class MyCheckedChangeListener : public gaia::ui::ICompoundBtnCheckedChangeListener
 {
   public:
     MyCheckedChangeListener(gaia::core::Page* page);
     virtual ~MyCheckedChangeListener();
     virtual void onCheckedChanged(gaia::ui::CompoundButton* widget, bool isChecked);
 };

 CompoundButtonTest.cpp
 MyCheckedChangeListener::MyCheckedChangeListener(gaia::core::Page* page)
   : ICompoundBtnCheckedChangeListener()
 {
 }

 MyCheckedChangeListener::~MyCheckedChangeListener()
 {
 }

 void MyCheckedChangeListener::onCheckedChanged(gaia::ui::CompoundButton* widget, bool isChecked)
 {
    //Called when the checked state of a compound button has changed.
 }

 void CompoundButtonTest::onInit(Persistence* const p) {

    // Initialize CheckBox
    gaia::ui::CheckBox mpCheckBox = new gaia::ui::CheckBox(static_cast<Page*>(this));

    // Initialize ICompoundBtnCheckedChangeListener and add it into the CheckBox
    MyCheckedChangeListener* mpListener = new MyCheckedChangeListener(static_cast<Page*>(this));
    mpCheckBox->setOnCheckedChangeListener(mpListener);
 }
